Boulders had literally buried him. He was aching from the injuries he 
had suffered, but it was a good sign - he was still online. However, 
he was also depleted.

He tried to push himself out of the rubbles, but found that he could 
not. He then resorted to doing what he didn't want to; calling out to 
his sister.

Rockseeker: Sister Lunekill, do you hear me? I'm trapped under a pile 
of rock. Care to lend a hand?
